item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a Master’s in Computer Science Student at Northeastern University, Boston. I like computers and not just software, but all its aspects. I have two years of work experience as a software developer. Working in a finance company which is not purely tech driven, I migrated their technology setup to AWS cloud and created several APIs. In my daily work, I am also involved with creation and maintenance of current services for their better optimization and performance.
